author: rubys
msg: Replace perl implementation of cvs login with a Java one.  This code
is based on code from jakarta-ant; will provide feedback to the ant-dev
mailing list of issues found in the original code base.

author: rubys
msg: Automatic login to each :pserver: repository.  Not sure where the original
source of the encoding algorithm came from, I got it from Jon Stevens.

author: rubys
msg: The repository attribute was serving a dual purpose - split into two
